thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Ms Joanne Finglas
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Ms Joanne Finglas

author: Ms Joanne Finglas
title: Ms Joanne Finglas
text: I was looking for Adidas Gazelles for my son. They were cheapest in Lifestyle Sports. When I went into the store they were sold out. The sales assistant checked other stores but they were sold out. She then checked online and again the size I wanted was sold out!! I went online later myself and purchased them in a few easy steps. Will definitely use the online site more often.
